attributes.contentHtml:
https://tzsolutions.tech/ - TechZack owns TZ Solutions and he gets defensive and bans people who question/criticize their legitimacy.

Everything on their Hostify template website links to their Discord server. This whole operation is on their Discord server, including billing through discord. They don't even have a proper billing platform. I can't stress enough to hosts that Discord is not a billing platform, so stop using Discord for everything. They're also advertising their hosting on other SMP's Discord servers who are paying customers. I don't know what kind of deal they made with their customers, but if I'm paying them already and not being sponsored for a free server, then why this promotion?

The promotion in a paying customer's SMP server below, he made a channel dedicated to TZ Solutions.

They're using a .tech domain, which you can get for free from the Github Student Developer Pack. When I DM'ed one of their customers on the host's legitimacy, the customer told the owner (TechZack) about me and I immediately got banned from TZSolutions Discord server. Now, the customer didn't mean it or even thought I was going to get banned. Some hosts just can't take simple criticism even when it's in private messages. The customer was very useful and complying to my investigation and research on TZSolutions. The customer did told me their marketing practices below, which is purely through DM advertising on Discord. Here's the convo below:

Okay
Here i just copied the discussion
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Hello
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
How are you doing?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Im good
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
I was wondering how much RAM does your server have?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
6
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
How much do you pay for that?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Too much, 33.98
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Jesus/
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
mhmh
ther server is about to expire in like 2 hours so i can switch hosting soon
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Well... I might be able to offer you a deal if you would like that would be cheaper.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
I would
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
What would you need storage/RAM wise?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
about 6 or 7, because of plugins and world generation
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Okay and should I say about 100GB Storage?
Or 200GB?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
100 gb sounds good, my current storage is 10 gb which is pretty bad
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
I could do 

4 vCores
8GB DDR4 RAM
100GB SSD
DDOS Protection
Dedicated IP

For 18GBP
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
A month?
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Correct
But that means you'd have much more performance compared to the host your on now.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Thats more than i pay for right now, its 60 dollars every 3 months for me
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
You just said.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Thats for every month
*3 months
Hmm
Here let me check something first then i will decide
first question
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
I might be able to get it a little cheaper hold on.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
okay then
Also, are there services for quickly moving how my server is to your hosting site?
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Yes there is.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Thats helpful, thank you.
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Region Wise EU or NA?
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
NA
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
I can do EU for 15GBP ($20 USD) z

That would include DDOS Protection 2 Cores of a CPU and 8GB RAM and also being on a Panel

This would also stop you being on a Overallocated Server as you would have your own server just for you.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
I like that deal
Alright then
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
I might be able to cater for NA
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
Right I can cater EU or NA now.
If that is fine for you I can sort out the payment and get your server up so we can start migrating from your old server.
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Alright
Im in florida so if there is a better area for that than ill take it.
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
It will be in Chicago so you won't be effected.
Do you want to hop into a Voicecall?
You missed a call from 
TZ Solutions
 that lasted 2 minutes.
 â€” 08/27/2021
Zombieplays04122 â€” 08/27/2021
Sure, sorry i was doing something
TZ Solutions
 started a call that lasted 2 hours.
 â€” 08/27/2021
TZ Solutions â€” 08/27/2021
No worries.
I'll be waiting there.

They gave the customer a Chicago location even though the customer said that he was in Florida, which I will get into later about their deceptive locations. They use HostVenom and their specs for the Chicago location are i7-6700K and likely 64 GB ram (the max memory that processor can handle). The irony here is when they say: "That would include DDOS Protection 2 Cores of a CPU and 8GB RAM and also being on a Panel This would also stop you being on a Overallocated Server as you would have your own server just for you." Really? The i7-6700K only has 4 cores/8 threads and you're giving them 2 cores, which is half of the processor already and 1/8 of the system's memory. If you do the same to one more customer and allocate them 2 cores, then your cores aren't dedicated anymore, they're shared/overallocated.


In their discord, they claim to have secured Los Angeles, Miami, and New York (since the beginning of the month of August 2021). Sounds very much like the whole premium ReliableSite squad, but no. Further investigation shows that they have only one of these locations. In fact, they use Contabo-New York, Hostvenom-Chicago, OVH-Montreal. That's very concentrated on the northeast of North America. https://securitytrails.com/list/apex_domain/tzsolutions.tech

euvps-1.tzsolutions.tech Fyeweb - UK
navps-2.tzsolutions.tech OVH - Montreal
navps-3.tzsolutions.tech HostVenom - Chicago
navps-4.tzsolutions.tech Contabo - New York

Also this:

ðŸ¤¦Boy, your main website is just a one-page static HTML page. It doesn't serve any special purpose other than linking everything back to their Discord server. So about the "hardware upgrade" aka moving to another shared hosting provider. They are currently using NovoNode shared web hosting.

attributes.title: TZSolutions | Everything on site links to Discord, Billing on Discord, DM Advert
